answers.answer: That's exactly what happen with me with my second He weighed 9.5 pounds and I passed the 1 hour too. But know with my third I passed the 1 hour but I feel exactly the same as with my second so I have a third unltrasound at 35 weeks so we will see. Good luck.

question: Hi there. So with baby girl #1 I failed the 1-hour test but passed the 3-hour test. Had no additional ultrasounds after the anatomy scan at 20 weeks or so. She was born 7lb11oz.Now preg with boy and they wanted to check on a fibroid so I had a 36 week scan. He  is already 7lb110z at 36 weeks and fluid measured 27 (ideal max is 25) so they suspect diabetes. But with him I passed the 1hr and never took a 3 hour. Now I have to take a 3hr at almost 37 weeks. Anyone else have this happen to them?DH said all the boys in his family weighed over 9 pounds but that would not explain the fluid would it? Feel like it's too late and damage is done :(
title: Gestational Diabetes after passing test?
